attributes.action: encourage supermarkets to drop their cheap alcohol promotions and reduce food prices instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of seeing adverts about cheap alcohol, encouraging people to drink more and pay less. Reduce prices for items used every day, like food, especially fresh fruit and vegetables. I'm not a drinker and won't be dictated to by those that want to turn me into an alcoholic.
